house_listing.house_description: This condominium built in 1966 has 2 bedroom(s), 2 bath(s) , 2 car garage and approximately 830 square feet of living area. Rooms include family room. Features include private pool, private spa, air conditioning, skylights.
house_listing.firm_name: Beachfront Realty, Lic. Real Estate Broker
house_listing.residential_listing_-_additional_feature: Cathedral/Vaulted Ceilings, Elevator, Kitchen Island, Ocean Access,Skylights, Smoke Detector, Tennis Court(s)
